passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > header:nth-child(3) > div > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div > footer > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > form:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
